meaning_str.bing:
n. 警示；警戒；先兆
v. “warn”的现在分词
网络. 警告；警报；警告信息

警告；警示；警报；预警；预兆；提醒；告诫；劝诫；危险信号；警戒标志；警示信号；前车之鉴
警告的；表示警告的；告诫的；引以为戒的；预警的
警告；预警；告诫；警报；警告；预警；告诫；警报；提醒；劝告；预兆；（warn的现在分词）

1.en: The president said that given the warning signs, the suspect should have never been allowed to board.
1.cn: 总统说，发出警告标志，受疑人应该有永远不会被允许板。

2.en: Earlier this year, a written warning telling her to shape up from her producer in Georgia Rules was circulated in the press.
2.cn: 今年早些时候，她的《乔治亚法则》的制作人发出的告诉她好自为之的书面警告在新闻界到处流传。

3.en: The first time I was late, Miss O'Neill excused me with the warning that she would not be so magnanimous the next time.
3.cn: 我第一次迟到时，奥尼尔小姐原谅了我，但她警告说下一次她就不会这么宽宏大量了。

1.en: Let this be a warning to the world.

2.en: What are they? What the stone was warning me about.
2.cn: 它们是什么？正是宝石警告我的东西。

3.en: They have detected the message warning them to protect themselves.
3.cn: 它们收到了警告袭击来临的信息，随后 它们也开启了防卫机制。

4.en: Which is kind of a big deal. Of course I could let you off with a warning if you were to glove those trunks.
4.cn: 这也不是小事了，当然如果你肯戴上我是可以给你个警告了事。

5.en: Well, no, it's just, I'm just warning you, you know, if you find yourself 3,000 miles away and craving a hit of this, you know I can't Skype it to you.
5.cn: 不，我只是警告你，当你发现自己在五千公里之外渴望得到这诱人的身躯，我不能通过视频给你。

6.en: Sheldon, I'm warning you, I can play this game, too. If it's like your 3-D chess game, then you're out of your length, width and depth.
6.cn: 谢尔顿，我警告你，你玩的小把戏的我也会玩。如果你玩小把戏和玩三维象棋的水准一样，那你可是在三个维度上都不自量力。

7.en: I just can't believe that Mike didn't give me any warning.
7.cn: 我真不明白，为什么他不给我点暗示。

8.en: A nearby cell sees the warning and immediately goes into action.
8.cn: 旁边一个细胞看到了这个警示，立刻开始行动。

9.en: Just warning you. I'm gonna go right. Don't make a big deal out of it.
9.cn: 提醒你下，这次我要弄右边，不要大惊小怪哦。

10.en: He doesn't usually go against my advice without giving me fair warning.
10.cn: 他一般不会招呼都不打，就违背我的建议。

11.en: Word of warning page 73. I don't understand. It makes no sense. It looks impossible.
11.cn: 提醒一下，是第73页的。我完全不明白，说不通啊，不可能啊。

12.en: Your honor, this bullet is clearly a warning of violence to come to Mrs. Ruiz and her family.
12.cn: 法官阁下，这枚子弹无疑是对鲁伊兹夫人及其家人的暴力威胁。

13.en: Fair warning, we can get crazy. Yeah. Last week we smoked cigars and pretended to be dragons.
13.cn: 友情提示: 我们会变得很疯狂的哦。是呀，上周我们抽了雪茄，还假装自己是龙呢。

14.en: Word of warning, though. I'm prone to night terrors so when I wake up kicking and screaming, don't panic.
14.cn: 不过，温馨提示，我有夜惊倾向，所以如果我睁眼乱踢或尖叫，别慌。

15.en: M's idea? Precisely. Oh, one word of warning. The alarm is rather loud. If you know what I mean. I think I do.
15.cn: M的主意吗？正是，要提醒你下，闹钟声音挺响的，你要是懂我意思的话。明白。

16.en: Fair warning, may be working out some anger issues on the racquetball court this morning. Don't ask. Sounds good.
16.cn: 说明一下，今早的壁球训练我可能要发泄一下情绪，别问原因。没问题。

17.en: Authorities in San Francisco are attributing a tremendous amount of lives saved, thanks to local experts, who were able to give ample warning of the massive quake.
17.cn: 以及旧金山政府对那位专家致以衷心的感谢，正是因为他及时向大众发出地震预警从而拯救了无数人的生命。
